problem_text_cn: 如图,为测量池塘的宽AB,先在池塘外选一点O,连接AO、BO,测得AO=18cm,BO=21cm,再延长AO、BO分别到C、D两点,使OC=6cm,OD=7cm,若测得CD=5cm,则池塘宽AB等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, to measure the width AB of the pond, firstly, select a point O outside the pond, connect AO and BO, and measure AO = N_0, BO = N_1, and then extend AO and BO to C and D respectively, so that OC = N_2 , OD = N_3, if CD = N_4 is measured, then the pond width AB is equal to ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的判定与性质,得出△ABO∽△CDO是解题关键．
